name: Crazy Car - LD36
description:
Try out crazy car! More of a toy than a game, ride around the city in your bouncy car and make huge jumps and go through the waypoints. No real point to the game other than to have fun!

The coolest part about this is the arcadey physics vehicle. The suspension bounces up and down as you accelerate and make jumps. Suspension is simulated for each corner of the bounding box giving us limitless possibilities as to what our vehicle can be, here it's a car, but it could be a tank or a hovercraft too!

Controls:

Keyboard : WASD

Xbox Controller : Left thumbstick for turning, A for forward acceleration, B for reverse.
